Messages.BadAddress: Address {0} is incorrect or positioned outside bus.

Messages.BadBusSettings2: Output buffer of bus {0} is smaller then expected. Please check configuration file. Bus width {1} bits.
Messages.BadSpans: Invalid configuration. There are overlapping buses.

Messages.TokenSameIds: Signal with Id {0} occurred multiple times. One of them named {1}.
Messages.TokenNoField: Signal does not have field name.
